column1: Uchi////I was quite unimpressed with the Uchiviche. It's low in citrus and high in spice. The Walu walu
column2: which is a 3x2 sq in of fish
column3: is difficult to eat with chopsticks and the (soy?) sauce ruins it. The shag is good but the outer fried bit overpowers the sushi taste. Also
column5: its heavy in lactose. =l The service is pretty good other than their tendency to not make sense when talking to you. Each of those dishes were $6 during HH. Also
column6: we got an uchi salad on the house. The dressing dip is really good.
